languages.text: "Раз мы убили воинов, что почитались на арене... нас должны бояться. Но почему я чувствую багровый кровожадности вокруг нас?"
"We killed the arena's most revered warriors... They should fear us now. So why do I feel crimson bloodlust closing in around us?"
languages.original_text: "Раз мы убили воинов, что почитались на арене... нас должны бояться. Но почему я чувствую багровый кровожадности вокруг нас?"

traits.locale_text: "We killed the arena's most revered warriors... They should fear us now. So why do I feel crimson bloodlust closing in around us?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We killed the arena's most revered warriors... They should fear us now. So why do I feel crimson bloodlust closing in around us?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We killed the arena's most revered warriors... They should fear us now. So why do I feel crimson bloodlust closing in around us?"

traits.locale_text: "We killed the arena's most revered warriors... They should fear us now. So why do I feel crimson bloodlust closing in around us?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我们已经杀死了竞技场中最受尊敬的战士……他们现在应该很害怕我们。但既然如此，为什么我却感觉到猩红色的嗜血正朝我们而来呢？”
languages.original_text: "We killed the arena's most revered warriors... They should fear us now. So why do I feel crimson bloodlust closing in around us?"

traits.locale_text: “我们已经杀死了竞技场中最受尊敬的战士……他们现在应该很害怕我们。但既然如此，为什么我却感觉到猩红色的嗜血正朝我们而来呢？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Nous avons tué les guerriers les plus puissants de l'arène, ils devraient donc nous craindre, à présent. Pourtant, je sens une soif de sang rouge écarlate tout autour de nous... »
languages.original_text: "We killed the arena's most revered warriors... They should fear us now. So why do I feel crimson bloodlust closing in around us?"

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons tué les guerriers les plus puissants de l'arène, ils devraient donc nous craindre, à présent. Pourtant, je sens une soif de sang rouge écarlate tout autour de nous... »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Hemos matado a los guerreros más respetados de la arena. Deberían tenernos miedo. ¿Por qué entonces siento una sed de sangre escarlata cernirse sobre nosotros?».
languages.original_text: "We killed the arena's most revered warriors... They should fear us now. So why do I feel crimson bloodlust closing in around us?"

traits.locale_text: «Hemos matado a los guerreros más respetados de la arena. Deberían tenernos miedo. ¿Por qué entonces siento una sed de sangre escarlata cernirse sobre nosotros?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「闘技場で一番崇拝されている戦士を殺害したのです…今や私たちは恐れられいるはず。それでも、真紅の血に飢えた者に囲まれているように感じるのはなぜでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "We killed the arena's most revered warriors... They should fear us now. So why do I feel crimson bloodlust closing in around us?"

traits.locale_text: 「闘技場で一番崇拝されている戦士を殺害したのです…今や私たちは恐れられいるはず。それでも、真紅の血に飢えた者に囲まれているように感じるのはなぜでしょう？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Wir haben die angesehensten Krieger der Arena getötet ... Sie sollten uns nun fürchten. Warum also spüre ich rote Blutgier, die sich uns von allen Seiten nähert?"
languages.original_text: "We killed the arena's most revered warriors... They should fear us now. So why do I feel crimson bloodlust closing in around us?"

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben die angesehensten Krieger der Arena getötet ... Sie sollten uns nun fürchten. Warum also spüre ich rote Blutgier, die sich uns von allen Seiten nähert?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "We killed the arena's most revered warriors... They should fear us now. So why do I feel crimson bloodlust closing in around us?"

languages.text: "Arenanın en saygıdeğer dövüşçülerini öldürdük. Artık bizden korkmaları gerekirken nedense kızıl bir kana susamışlığın etrafımızı sardığını hissedebiliyorum."
languages.original_text: "We killed the arena's most revered warriors... They should fear us now. So why do I feel crimson bloodlust closing in around us?"

traits.locale_text: "Arenanın en saygıdeğer savaşçılarını öldürdük. Artık bizden korkmaları gerekiyor ama nedense kızıl bir kana susamışlığın etrafımızı sardığını hissedebiliyorum."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
